about_the_game:
From a leisurely jog to an intense bench-pressing session, your Manga characters need a great work-out outfit!

ComiPo!: Work & Training wear contains 28 new clothing items, including 6 sports wear outfits, 4 work-out outfits and 4 casual jackets for both male and female characters. Whether you're looking for a wardrobe for the athlete in your school dating Manga or need a casual outfit for your business person, you'll find both variety and detail in this pack. A fantastic companion to other ComiPo! collections, Work & Training Wear expands the creative potential of your projects more than ever!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: MicrosoftR Windows 8.1 (64-bit) / 10 (64-bit)
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: VRAM 128 MB or more, Pixel Shader 2.0 or higher.
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: PCs manufactured in year 2009 and later
